content.rendered:
10X Your Affiliate Earnings with AI-Powered WordPress Content

GiftPrime’s WordPress plugin uses cutting-edge AI to generate high-converting, SEO-optimized affiliate articles in minutes – not hours. Start boosting your passive income today!
Register
See Pricing
Transform your WordPress site into an affiliate powerhouse. Create high-converting Amazon content with just a few clicks.
Download WordPress Plugin
Seamlessly integrate Amazon products into your content. Boost your earning potential with one-click product insertion.
Add Chrome Extension
GiftPrime AI content plugin allows you to create Amazon affiliate content in just a few clicks.
Download WordPress Plugin
Adds Amazon products to GiftPrime WordPress Plugin
Add Chrome Extension

Brands that work with GiftPrime

Create High-Converting Affiliate Content in Minutes

We’re all you need to supercharge your affiliate revenue, so you can focus on creating top-notch content.

  • You've put in the effort to drive traffic. Now, let GiftPrime take you to new heights.
  • GiftPrime revolutionizes your affiliate workflow, creating high-quality, SEO-optimized content that boosts clicks and conversions.
  • Our AI-powered platform plugs revenue leaks and pinpoints your top-performing pages and products, empowering you to double down on what works.
  • Your Affiliate Revenue on GiftPrime imagine having all your affiliate content creation, link management, tracking, and monetization handled for you.
  • With GiftPrime, you can focus on what you do best - crafting amazing content and scaling your business.
  • We're already powering thousands of successful affiliate marketers.

Premium Content, Effortlessly

Empower Your Website with GiftPrime’s Expertly-Crafted, Engaging Content Tailored for Publishers and Bloggers

01

Product Review

Publish in-depth product reviews with “Buy” buttons and related product carousels in just two clicks. GiftPrime connects your affiliate links, helping you earn while providing value.

See some examples:
  • Review of RGB Gaming Headset Stand
  • Amazfit Bip 3 Pro Smart Watch Review
  • Eye Essence: Effective and Nourishing Review
Register
Roundup
Light-roundup
Roundup

02

Roundup

Publish in-depth product reviews with “Buy” buttons and related product carousels in just two clicks. GiftPrime connects your affiliate links, helping you earn while providing value.

See some examples:
  • Top Gaming Keyboards for Enthusiasts
  • Top Card Games for Fun and Laughter
Register
Light-roundup

02

Light-Roundup​

Compare up to 50 products side-by-side, highlighting their features, pros, and cons. All Amazon links are connected to your affiliate account, ensuring you earn commissions while empowering your audience to make informed purchasing decisions.
See some examples:
  • Keep the Kids Entertained: Weekend Fall Fun Toys and Games from Amazon for the Family
  • Helpful Back-to-School Gadgets
  • Grill Master’s Arsenal
Register

03

Comparison Article

Publish in-depth product reviews with “Buy” buttons and related product carousels in just two clicks. GiftPrime connects your affiliate links, helping you earn while providing value.

See some examples:
  • Razer Gaming Mouse Showdown
  • Battle of Keyboards
  • Apple M1 vs M2
Register

04

Listicle Pro-Pics

Create engaging listicles featuring AI-generated or professional images that captivate your audience, driving engagement and showcasing your content in an appealing, easy-to-consume format.
See some examples:
  • Coffee and Health: 25 Surprising Facts
  • 20 Essential Tips for Mastering fishing the currents
  • 25 Essential PUBG Tips for Beginners to Dominate the Battleground
Register

05

Deals

Discover and share the best Amazon deals on our interactive “Deals” page. Easily upload enticing offers and integrate seamless “Buy” links to ensure your readers enjoy unbeatable prices. Take advantage of our affiliate program to enhance your earnings as your audience shops smart and saves big. Dive into a world of savings and amplify your income with each transaction.

See some examples:
  • You Won’t Want to Miss These Hot Kitchen Deals on Amazon
  • Don’t Miss Out: 40 Hot Amazon Deals for Parents
  • Best Deals Right Now on Amazon for Fitness Gear and Accessories
Register

Top Questions from Our Users

Get Quick Answers to Your Most Pressing GiftPrime Queries
  • How to Begin Using GiftPrime?
In your WordPress plugin section, search for ‘GiftPrime’, then follow the instructions to get started. If you enjoy using GiftPrime and wish to upgrade, you can do so directly from the GiftPrime plugin dashboard.
  • Is GiftPrime compatible with all WordPress themes and page builders?
Yes, GiftPrime is designed to work seamlessly with any WordPress theme or page builder available in the market, ensuring a smooth and hassle-free integration with your existing website.
  • Do I need an Amazon API to use GiftPrime?
No, there’s no need for an Amazon API to use GiftPrime. All you need is a WordPress site and an Amazon affiliate tag from your account to get started.
  • What languages does GiftPrime support?
As Version 1.0.0, GiftPrime primarily supports English for content generation. We are continually working to expand our language capabilities to cater to a wider audience in the future.
  • What Amazon Stores does GiftPrime support?
As Version 1.0.0, GiftPrime supports Amazon.com And Amazon.co.uk
  • What does GiftPrime offer in terms of refund policy?
GiftPrime allows you to upgrade, downgrade, or cancel your subscription according to your content requirements. If you need assistance with your account, feel free to reach out to us at (insert email address). For a detailed explanation of GiftPrime’s refund policy, please refer to our policy documentation. We are confident that when you join GiftPrime, you’ll have everything you need to create content efficiently and on a large scale.

The GiftPrime Blog

Your gateway to the latest advancements in artificial intelligence and technology! . Join us on this exciting journey as we unravel the future possibilities and unleash the power of AI together.
